author: dspencer
msg: Use <span> instead of <font> (as in GradientFormatter) to keep Mozilla happy.

author: dspencer
msg: Make highlightForeground and highlightBackground so that this can be extended in another package, esp in the case where only highlightTerm() is changed.

author: mharwood
msg: Changed visibility of methods to allow easier extensions - Thx Dave Spencer for suggestion.
Subclasses can now override highlightTerm to format text with spans/divs  etc instead of default <font> tag

author: mharwood
msg: Updated with new information on using new QueryScorer.getMaxWeight

author: mharwood
msg: Chaned score to float and added QueryScorer.getMaxTermWeight (useful for callibrating GradientFormatter)
